website_summaries.verdict: Another highly-rated desk lamp with impressive adjustability with other helpful features.
pros: LED light offers 4 different lighting modes for reading, study, relaxation, and bedtime alongside 5 brightness levels
Includes an auto-timer and a built-in USB charging port
cons: Light can be a bit bright for some
Lamp base seems a bit oversized

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is great. It has four lighting settings and you can additionally adjust the brightness on each setting. The height is easily adjustable so the people who mentioned having trouble with glare clearly didn’t understand they could just move the lamp’s head around. Has a 60 minute timer and a USB port. Very Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Love This Light!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 of these lamps for home office and work office. Love them! The articulating ability is great for accommodating various needs. The variety of light settings is wonderful when at your desk all day. From bright white to warm low light, you can choose your setting depending on the task (or your headache). No problem recommending this one!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Lampat Dimmable LED Lamp.... Awesome!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good lamp. I have had zero issues. I have one on my desk and one on each night stand in my bedroom. Works great charging our phones while we sleep. I also love the sleep mode function. I get into bed, push the sleep mode, turn the tv on and boom off to sleep with everything turning off in an hour. Shameless plug = See my review in its entirety on you tube. Just search Isaiah's Reviews and enjoy them all. Remember while you're there to like and subscribe. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great LED Lamp - Choose this one if you are comparing
customer_reviews.text: Love this LED lamp - it rocks. I have purchased three different LED lamps for work and home. This one is the best by far. Love the heavy base. Wasn't expecting it to be such a nice weight so it won't tip over. The brightness levels are perfect, covers all the levels one would need. And it has a 60 minute timer should you fall asleep before turning it off. Highly recommend. I use these at work because I can't stand the fluorescent lights, which I have the maintenance folks remove the bulbs. Then I just use these LED desk lamps. I will definitely purchase this particular brand from this particular seller in the future. No issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: SWsam

customer_reviews.title: Nice while it lasted....
customer_reviews.text: Light seemed fine when I got it, however depending on how you angle the light it would often dim. After only 4 months of use, the light crapped out. Can't tell if its the bulb, which it shouldn't be, possibly could be the power source? Either, cheap flimsy build. Definitely would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: This Lamp works perfectly as described
customer_reviews.text: This lamp works perfectly for what I need it to do. The uses i have this lamp for is for studying and reading papers with a lamp that won't wake up other people in the same room I'm studying in as well as being used for a light source to reduce strain on the eyes in a dark room while viewing a monitor. Simple to use sleek design and sits elegantly on a simple designed desk.
customer_reviews.author: Bird

customer_reviews.title: This lamp works wonderfully for the first 5 months I've had it
customer_reviews.text: This lamp works wonderfully for the first 5 months I've had it. The brightness of the light is recommended for those who spend hours under a light such as students like myself. However, it completely shut off and now cannot be powered back on, rendering it defective beyond use. Extremely disappointing...
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: This light works perfectly on my desk.
customer_reviews.text: Provides a nice bright light for desk work and while on my computer. I don't tend to use any setting other than the brightest, given my failing eyesight. It is such a slim, inconspicuous addition on my desk. I esp love the USB port that allows me to recharge my phone and reduces the cordage around the outlet. It is well weighted and doesn't tip over. It took me a while to choose from the many options, but I made a good choice for my needs and my space.
customer_reviews.author: Melisa Walker

customer_reviews.title: Just what I need for a desk lamp!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived quickly and took about 1 minute to assemble. Just unscrew the bottom of the post, insert into the base and screw back in. Plug it in and you're all set. Controls are easy to find and simple on/off plus levels for work, reading, nightlight make it easy to adjust. This is especially nice, since others I have ordered make it hard to hunt and peck to find the on/off/control button. This one is very obvious how to get the various levels. Good extension for coverage. I have several rental units and will order more since almost all guests now require a work area for remote working. Great Value, Easy Setup, Simple Operation - what more could you want!
customer_reviews.author: Gungo

customer_reviews.title: multiple kight levels and heavy base
customer_reviews.text: 16 light levels, really nice construction. Heavy base to help from tipping over. Really nice ambiance effect with light shining out back of lamp. Light heaD FOLDS DOWN, to the support base. Back if support base has holes that allow light to emit from the support stand and a reduced level.. Light stand on support above the bed. The head board has a large mirror, which reflects the light out of the stand and creates a fine glow in the room. With all led light source, very low current level.
customer_reviews.author: mike mccrann

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp. I bought two of them a few months apart. In another month I will be at 5 years. They are both going strong. They are bright with the ability to dim at will. They swivel on the base which is a nice feature. You do not have to move the whole lamp if you want to illuminate a different area of your desk. They also have a USB charging port. It does not provide Fast charging, but it will charge my Galaxy S10.
customer_reviews.author: NerdyNurse

customer_reviews.title: Can't say enough about it!
customer_reviews.text: I am really amazed at this very nice nice looking lamp. It is impressive how it's brightness is clear and not shocking to my eyes. Love the timer it keeps me on track for staying within my boundaries for the day. The sleep mode I like for light reading in the evening. This product is outstanding for light adjustment over my desk which is actually a table desk. I can't say enough when the manufacture add the USB charging port which sets this piece apart from other lights I have tried. Thanks to the Lamp at Company for making a lamp that has all that you need for the price. My order# is 111-28517169911409
customer_reviews.author: Helpful person

customer_reviews.title: The touch buttons are not very responsive in fact occasionally ...
customer_reviews.text: The touch buttons are not very responsive in fact occasionally I will have to push several times for the light to close. Also I prefer the other led lamp that I bought which has eye protection where you can't see the individual led lights. I'm leaning towards returning this model and spending a little more and getting the other brand (taotronics) Update, the power button doesn't work, (maybe works once every 4-5 touches)
customer_reviews.author: Smart rat

customer_reviews.title: Loved it! Even bought a second one!
customer_reviews.text: The reason I first purchased this lamp was the design. It has a long narrow light instead of being a traditional bulb-type lamp. I find this to be a better light for working with papers and on the computer. You can adjust it easily and modify the brightness. There are some preset options for brightness, but then also buttons to adjust the light. It doesn't take up much space and I love the USB port so I can plug in my phone also! I just purchased a second one to use in the kitchen where I needed some additional lighting. I know it is mainly a "desk" lamp, but the design looks good anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: K. McRitchie

customer_reviews.title: Great home office desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: I searched extensively on Amazon for the right LED desk lamp and this item had the best reviews so far. Despite the reviews, I was a bit hesitant as I did not like the idea of not being able to replace the LED bulbs. However, I decided to take the leap and purchased item. I was impressed with the sleek design and ease of functionally. It really is easy to adjust positions/angles and brightness level but most importantly, I appreciate the individual buttons for 1hr sleep timer and on/off. The other models have a very basic/consolidated interface. Needless to say, I hope this lamp lasts for a while and doesn't burn out as it did for other customers.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp with minimal footprint and ample features
customer_reviews.text: Love the choices in both brightness and temperature for this lamp! With 4 different modes and multiple dimming levels available for each it has more than I even need. The base is also very flexible and you're able to direct the lamp in multiple directions. The only thing I would add is a rotating feature to the part holding the bulb itself, that would make it complete. The base is a nice weight and has no problem holding this lamp upright. I personally don't ever use a sleep mode on anything, that's why I've omitted reviewing that feature. Very pleased and would recommend to anyone looking for a nice desk lamp. :)
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hardesty

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought it would be!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light. I was replacing an older large-ish desk lamp with this LED lamp. What a difference! I love that when not in use I can fold it down. It is almost invisible on my desk. When opened up and turned on, it has great lighting ability though. I love how easily adjustable the brightness as well as the "warmness" of the light is. It has a nice sturdy base as well. I really cannot say anything bad about this light. I would totally buy it again or recommend it to others. It needed minor assembly of light bar to the base but was easy to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: D. Tharp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect desk lap.
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp. Various settings let me set the brightness and tint of the light for different situations. The different settings are: Reading - Very bright, yellow and white tints combined. Study - Bright and pure white Relax - Slightly bright, yellow and white mixed tint Sleep - Dim, yellow light On top of the settings you also have the capability to adjust the brightness up or down from the default. It is touch sensitive so there aren't physical buttons which I thought was neat. There is also a 60 min timer for those bedside readers.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp for College Dorm!
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was a cool looking product, but when I tried it, it far exceeded my expectations! 60 min timer, multiple light colors and adjustable light brightness with memory for each! Also a 60 min timer. Not sure if I will use the USB much but it's nice its an option and it is the correct amperage for a phone. I was worried the light wouldn't be wide enough but it definitely is! Much wider than a traditional lamp. Also has a nice look and can fold away nicely. Smudges easily but oh well. Using this for my dorm and can't wait!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Blegen

customer_reviews.title: Bought one in 2015, just bought another. Greatest Desk Lamp Ever. Just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these desk lamps in 2015 for my house. This made a perfect desk lamp. Fast forward to 2018 and I found myself needing one for my desk at work. So I bought another one of these lamps! This lamp is just as awesome as the one I bought in 2015, and the one I bought in 2015 still works perfectly. I love all the light settings and how you can dim it or turn up the brightness to JUST THE RIGHT LEVEL. If you're thinking about buying this, don't hesitate, just buy it. When I bought this in 2015, it was $40. For the price it's selling for now, this is a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Neal

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp, but I don't love the finish
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great product. I love the design and it looks great in my office, but I don't love the shiny plastic finish that is noticeably warped. This is more apparent because it's so shiny and the reflections are distorted. I wish they'd make this in a matte finish and I would gladly pay $20 more for something not warped...but overall, it's a great value.
customer_reviews.author: ODH3

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light!
customer_reviews.text: The best part of this lamp is the amount of light produced. I had been using a regular table lamp for years, but as I have gotten older the need for adequate lighting is essential. The different types of light and the degrees of light afforded is wonderful. Whether paying bills, reading for pleasure, studying new recipes or working the crossword puzzle, the illumination is powerful and just what I needed. Small print is no longer a challenge. There is also a lower light level and a sleep timer. And it does not take up much space on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Cinema Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk Light!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it on the recommendation of a fellow attorney. Long hours working at the desk and I wanted a light that would not be in the way of my two monitors. I also wanted a light that I could adjust to the time of day and task at hand. I was originally willing to wait a month but the delivery date was shortened to about ten days. I am very pleased and appreciate the low aspect profile, that the light source is lower than my eye level, the color and brightness are variable and the price was way reasonable. I have used it daily for about a month and am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: GY

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I am looking for!
customer_reviews.text: My sinus headache has been exacerbated by the bright office overhead light. Someone recommended that I get a desk light. I gave this one a try and I am so glad I did. It has eliminiated my headache. The packaging has no assembling instruction but it is pretty straight forward. You just simply twist on the base. The base is pretty big but it needs to be to hold up the weight of the light. But the design is so sleek that it didn't matter. Plus you can put decor on the base. I love the touch buttons. This is definitely a good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: K.L.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for school and studying
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because our daughter needed some sort of light for her room due to online schooling and zoom calls. This provides 4 settings of lighting, all of which can be adjusted (brightness-wise). My daughter uses it all the time at her desk to study, do homework, zoom calls, and school. All 4 modes are work perfectly for their purpose. This is also touch-sensitive, so she found that rather efficient compared to her old lamp, which only powered by a lightbulb. The stand is adjustable and can be bent over. Overall, there's nothing we would change about it. 5 stars solid.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Bianchini

customer_reviews.title: Small lamp Big light
customer_reviews.text: This small lamp does not take much space on my desk, but provides ample light even in the sleep mode. The adjustable light and arm are fantastic for positioning the light where I need it without having to move the entire lamp. Inexpensive but well worth every bit of money I spent. I've not used the USB because I have numerous outlets near my desk in which to plug my phone charger, but will come in handy if I lose electricity because the lamp is plugged into my UPS in case I need light and to charge my phone. I highly recommend this light.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: You'll finally get rid of your halogen lamp
customer_reviews.text: This lamp differs from the equivalent Taotronics version (I tested them both) by having a much gentler relax/study mode, a more mellow light for low-light when you're not working directly under the lamp. I've bought and returned a zillion LED desk lamps, only to return them and go back to my beloved, white hot halogens. Not this time: this is the one I kept.
customer_reviews.author: T. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Office Desk Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I'd been looking for an office desk lamp for a long time... I have to say, this one is perfect. The base is nice and heavy / sturdy so the lamp doesn't move or tip over easily, it has several brightness modes, which is great depending on what you're doing or how much light you need, it has a handy 60 minute timer so you don't have to worry about forgetting to turn it off, and it's also got a USB port so you can plug in your phone or headset and charge it right there in front of you. Super inexpensive and definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SMB

customer_reviews.title: WOW!  Far better built, modes are great! This is a quality desk lamp.
customer_reviews.text: I've never liked the base of desk lamps until now. The base is so solid yet allows the light to turn with ease. The base is hefty and stays in place when adjusting the lamps arms. Multiple modes and the ability to dim each mode is very well thought out. The sleep timer works well. I was expecting a smaller lamp but I'm very happy it is as large as it is. It works well in the evening for mood lighting as well. I'm planning to buy more of these lamps for the bedside tables. Well built and inexpensive. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: ShawnME

customer_reviews.title: Really full featured for what at first looked like a basic LED desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: Looked at tons of different lamps before ordering. Our kids are doing virtual classes due to covid and it's not bright enough on their desks to work. I wasn't sure how bright the lights I was looking at were, and liked that this one was dimmable. It's nice and bright on high, but dims down nicely. I like the adjustable color temps too, even if the kids don't really get the difference. Haven't tried the sleep mode, but on a night stand that's probably a great feature. Buying a 3rd for my own desk.
customer_reviews.author: NetMagi

customer_reviews.title: Versatile lamp with useful features
customer_reviews.text: This lamp has been a great purchase. I would have never sought out to find a lamp with adjustable color temperature, but I change it often to match the ambient lighting in the room. This, along with the ability to adjust the lamps brightness, go a long way towards reducing eye strain when reading and working at the computer. The USB charging port on the side is also a nice touch, providing another charging port for your work space without adding clutter to your desk. The construction is basic but adequate, and considering the other features along with the very reasonable price, this is a clear winner.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ben

customer_reviews.title: Functional, good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for "COVID School" desk for the kids. Base is heavy, light itself is of lighter construction but we won't be moving it around much for our purpose. Best choice of light options for us is the "Relax" mode, more warm, the others are more daylight, dimmer is nice touch. Light does not pivot, just the up down and outward adjustments as noted in the description. Have not tried the charging function, and not sure about longevity as others have commented but can update review if any issues. Really compared to others on Amazon that we looked at this one was the best price for the features and so far it hasn't let us down.
customer_reviews.author: Jack of All Trades

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp, bought several, used for years
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these about two years ago and they have been great. I now bought 2 more in the last month and overall very happy with them; they have many light settings so its possible to find a good setting depending on need/mood etc. There have been no problems with the first lamps that I bought two years ago so I've bought more and looking forward to years of enjoyment. Easy to put the base on the lamp and get it operational in under a minute. I can highly recommend this lamp - don't buy the cheap knockoffs as they do not have the same quality light.
customer_reviews.author: Maui Tech Guru

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp. I have it at my computer desk. I have never had a lamp that I can change lighting and brightness. It is perfect for reading/studying, watching movies on my PC, or even just a night light. I use it every single day. I like that it is touch-sensitive. I also love how well it moves. I would say the only negative thing, it that I wasn't expecting was the base to be as big as it is. But I have plenty of space on my desk so it works out fine. Just look at the dimensions before you buy it to make sure it works for you. I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: TA

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lamp
customer_reviews.text: So I've been using the lamp for a little while now and I quite like it. The base is even nice and white and flat so I can save space by placing stuff on it. The different modes work well. The on/off button even stays on while the lamp is off so that you can find it easily in the dark. There's only one thing that was worrisome: I don't remember which mode it was but after a long time the lamp where the lightbulbs are got warm, which is odd because it's an L.E.D. lamp. It's still pretty good and I've already recommended it to my friends
customer_reviews.author: Vicki M

customer_reviews.title: This desk lamp really puts out great light. I love having a well-lighted work area ...
customer_reviews.text: This desk lamp really puts out great light. I love having a well-lighted work area and this lamp certainly does the job! It offers four lighting selections, plus adjustment for brighter or less bright for each of the four selections. The pole is adjustable which makes it easy to get the light where it is needed. It was easy to put together and has a USB charger too. This lamp has everything you could want in a desk light. I would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: CMCS

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works great
customer_reviews.text: This is a very modern lamp that has 4 modes combined with brightness settings for each mode separately. It saves the brightness between modes. The lamp looks exactly as advertised and is exactly what I wanted. The motion in the lamp is awesome for switching between different things on your desk (if needed). The only thing I don't like is that the plastic doesn't feel very sturdy while swiveling. You need to rotate the lamp at the base or it warps and feels like it might break. If you rotate it at the base, you also inevitably push buttons which is just a bit annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Kody Crossman

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this lamp to replace a similar one that didn't work as advertised. So far I really like it! It is quite bright when turned up all the way, which is important to me. I don't really know that all the modes are useful for me as I mostly use the reading mode, but they are nice to have, just in case. It has a phone charging port, but I haven't used this. It has a nice, flat base that is fairly substantial, so I don't think my cats will be able to knock it over. All in all I am pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bev B

customer_reviews.title: If you need a desk lamp, buy this one.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Exactly what I expected. I could tell from photos the black material is smudgey (so I try not to touch it so much and or clean it). I was however concerned with the modes, I just wasn't sure how they were, but they are awesome! It's not just that hospital super white light, it has yellow calming lights as well. It really is worth all the money you spend. I wanna say it was $20 bucks at the time I bought it. Haven't used the 60 min sleep timer but really love this desk lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lamp
customer_reviews.text: This lamp offers everything anyone could want. With various lighting options from warm to cool lighting and various intensities, you will be able to work, read, write in lighting that is perfect for your situation. The sleek modern style looks elegant yet unassuming. The option to have the lamp turn off after 60 minutes is really nice. I actually thought I'd never use this option but after I walked in my office in the morning and realized that I forgot to turn off my light, I began automatically hitting the 60 min option. This definitely deserves a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: This is the absolutely the perfect desk lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I have a small office space and desperately needed a good lamp. I found this awesome light right here & have have tried it out for a couple weeks & I have to tell you it’s perfect! It’s bright w/o being overbearing, there’s different settings depending on what I’m doing which is fantastic - one for working on the computer, one for reading,.....it even has a timer so it doesn’t stay on forever! A lot of thought went into this & it shows! I definitely would recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: I think I received a lemon :(
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working for several hours after the first week. Thought it was broken but after a few hours it works as designed. Update 2016 Great lamp, when it works. It's stopped working three times now... for no apparent reason... and then a few days later it works again. I am sure it's a lemon since most reviews are good. But three strikes and you have to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Plugged in office worker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Light
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect desk light. I love the different modes (reading, study, relax, and sleep) that change the tone of the white and it also gives you the ability to adjust the brightness within each mode. I have an L shaped desk in my home office with this light on the corner behind me and to my right. In the evenings when I'm still working this is the only light on in the room and it's plenty bright. You can't beat the price for what you're getting with this light.
customer_reviews.author: NHTFR

customer_reviews.title: Owned for a year, great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I got this for Black Friday last year (2017) and was surprised how nice it was for the price. I honestly didn't look at the specific details too much, I just bought it cause it had good reviews and after owning it for almost a year I have to agree with all the reviews. I almost always have it on the warmest light colour, but the range of colours is pretty great. I also like the brightness settings, the lowest setting is perfect for late nights and early mornjngs, and the brightest settings are as bright as you'd need them. I'm very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: What all desk lamps should aspire to be!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this desk lamp for my fiancé going through nursing school and spending countless hours at a desk trying to focus. From the minute it comes out of the box, it has a sleek and elegant look about it. It does not take up a lot of room. The different lighting modes are amazing and super bright! . It has several adjustment angles to point the light right where it is needed. Overall very happy with this purchase and would not hesitate to recommend to friends or buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Fozio

customer_reviews.title: sleep mode, large rotating angle, high quality
customer_reviews.text: 1. has many mode. thinking study and sleep mode are the most used. always use sleep mode when sleep. Interestingly, only with a little light can I get into sleep. 2. high quality. Hard to descripe the quality because never met a broken time. You can feel that when you see it. 3. roating or strech is very convenience. 4. the only worthy complaining thing is the position of the switch on the arm instead of the support. Having been used to the switch on the support, many time go to the support to look for the switch when open the light.
customer_reviews.author: littlezeros

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value - I now own two of these great lights!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these wonderful desk lamps several months ago for my office. I use it every day with great results. This second purchase was for my home in our game room where my wife and kids like to assemble puzzles and do arts and crafts. This desk lamp provides all the light that is needed .... with the ability to change the type of light and the intensity as they see fit. I highly recommend this desk lamp for the office or at home. It is a great desk lamp and an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B in SD

customer_reviews.title: Quick, easy and efficient
customer_reviews.text: This is a very effective soft white light, which I can use as either a back light for my desktop, or just as a room light, while at the same time I can charge my phone right there on my desk. I like the sleep mode because I often fall asleep while watching TV and now I don't have to get out of bed to put off the light, it will go off automatically. I can also just fold the light into a strip when it's not in use, great product. Priscilla Prichard
customer_reviews.author: yotavarez

customer_reviews.title: I love the versatility of this simple but stylish natural light desk lamp.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a desk lamp that would provide a comfortable way for reading books, documents, magazines or any print, without the blinding glare of a bright light. Many led lights are too bright and either hurt your eyes after hours of reading or create unwanted dark shadows on the page you want to read. This lamp offers the desk reader an enjoyable source of light that adjusts to their liking wether they are reading in a dark room or a lighted one near a window. I have had many but this little light of mine shines just where and how I want it to shine. I love the Lampat LED Desk Lamp. You will too.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Ainsworth

customer_reviews.title: Since i work remotely now...
customer_reviews.text: So for the past few months i've been muddling along without a proper desk light, i guess in hope we will be back to normal sooner rather than later. I finally gave in and purchased this light, mainly because the price was mid range and it had plenty of good reviews. Shipping was faster than they said had indicated a delay when i ordered which was great. Super easy to assemble and use, seems fairly sturdy too. It's not the cutest lamp in the world...but it does exactly what it's supposed to and is a great addition to my dark corner desk in the dining room.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Super practical features!!
customer_reviews.text: I have one on my nightstand and one in my office.I like the different light settings & the usb charger is so practical. Thelight is really bright or really friendly, depending on setting.The fact that I can go to bed with a book,hit the 60 min timer and it will shut off is awesome.It helps me save when Im rushed in the a.m. and in and out of the room. I only wish the red on button would less bright or maybe green, as I'm sensitive to light in general.
customer_reviews.author: Only P. Nephastus

customer_reviews.title: Online School Saver!
customer_reviews.text: We didn't realize how dark the space under my daughter's loft was as she tries to navigate online school this year. When she said something, we quickly ordered this light, based on the features and price point. It arrived in 2 days, looks sleek and works perfectly on a desk. My other kids are already asking for the same one! My favorite feature is that you can adjust both the brightness and the color setting (white light to more yellow light).
customer_reviews.author: waitingforfaces

customer_reviews.title: Very subtle and takes no room on desk
customer_reviews.text: I have a cluttered computer desk with all the monitors and accessories I need and this lamp takes no room on it. Not only that but the different brightness and mode levels are perfect for my needs. I need to see what's on my desk but it can't be brighter ort overtake my monitors as I do VFXs and and work with color on the monitors. The 'relax' mode is perfect for that or I have the lamp face the wall so it gives a nice backwash effect behind my monitors. It weights nothing and was super easy to put together. I am super happy and satisfied with this purchase. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Torres

customer_reviews.title: Sleek look and functional
customer_reviews.text: The lamp fits perfectly in my work desk. I really like how tall it is. I am able to have it lean over the keyboard without being a distraction in my face. The multiple light settings are a great touch that I have already start getting used to. An added bonus is the ability to brighten and dim the already pre-existing settings. Additionally, I was surprised on how fast it charged my phone when attaching a cable. Often times using a power source like this takes a long time because it doesn't provide enough power. Overall this is a quality lamp that I would recommend to anyone purchasing. Extremely fair price for a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Lagasse

customer_reviews.title: Perfect desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Lampat LED Desk Lamp in August of 2018. It was perfect! It is small and out of the way, lightweight, great looking, and when I need it the various light settings choices are great. I use the "study" setting the most, as I like the cooler lighting. Even within each of the three settings, you can adjust brighter or dimmer. The timer is great as I often walk off to do something and get distracted, so the lamp shuts itself off. Yesterday, I purchased a second one for my wife. I'm considering two more to use as reading lights on my nightstands. These give so much better light than my current traditional bulb lamps.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Clark-Hoyos

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT DESK LAMP!!
customer_reviews.text: I never have enough light at my computer desk and can't use the overhead light in the evenings because it is disruptive to the kids going to sleep. Needed a solution and found this desk lamp which provided the perfect solution! This lamp provides plenty of light to read by and has 4 different modes depending on what type of light best suits your purpose at the time. Can't say enough good things about it, it's adjustable from side to side, doesn't take up alot of space and definately lights the way for me! Don't hesitate, great lamp!
customer_reviews.author: Super Dave

customer_reviews.title: Over all it is a good investment.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this lamp for almost a year and I have to say! It is by far the best desk lamp I have ever owned. I love that it has different settings at the sliding of the finger over it the symbols. I love that it can be made slim and moved out of the way if I need it to be. It's light weight, it's slender, the neck is adjustable but sturdy it isn't even loose after nearly a year. Over all it is a good investment. OH, and I am not getting paid to say this. I am just a regular person doing life my way...
customer_reviews.author: The Thinker

customer_reviews.title: Brightness is Great!
customer_reviews.text: What a great desk lamp! I am a retired accountant and still do books for small businesses. At 70 years of age my eyesight is no longer perfect and additional light helps me to read those small print bank statements much easier. This lamp does the job 100%. I had purchased a desk lamp from Amazon previously and it gave out after 3 years and I'm glad because this lamp is 10x better & brighter. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RandMax50

customer_reviews.title: 2nd 5 star review Still think it is a Great lamp with a timer.
customer_reviews.text: I have no problem rating this lamp with 5 stars but you should be aware that the manufacturer promises anyone who gives it a 5 star review a $10 gift certificate. The lamp looks great, and has a substantially weighted base. It is very bright so I keep it on the Relax setting which is is lower than Reading or Studying. The best part is, it has an hour timer. I always use the timer so I do not have to remember to turn it off when I leave the room. I can not comment on the longevity because I have only had it one day.
customer_reviews.author: S. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Quality lamp
customer_reviews.text: Have had this lamp for a few days and I’m impressed by the simplistic design and the multiple dimming options. I only gave it 4/5 because between two of the dimming options they’re virtually the same and also the sleep mode doesn’t make it abundantly clear that it’s on until u see the power button flash. The directions don’t allude to this so I didn’t notice it was on sleep mode until after I was pressing the sleep mode button and removed my hand. I have yet to use that though.
customer_reviews.author: sb

customer_reviews.title: Slim, modern, efficient and bright!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp. So much so that after I ordered the first one, I went back for another. It is easy to put together - it just twists. It is very efficient. It is a touch to turn on and off - good for hands with arthritis. It has three modes - reading, study and relax. I am very pleased with it. On next to my computer and one next to the couch where I read and watch TV. I'll probably get a third for my nightstand.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Robey

customer_reviews.title: Beyond Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This desk lamp is really beyond EXCELLENT! It is so well made, it has a heavy secure base, highly polished finish, and very nice options for both different light (cool white or soft & warm), and adjustable brightness. We bought this lamp for our kitchen! We needed much better lighting at the sink and counter area for food preparation. The light will "lean forward" so this light is just what we needed. Buy it if you need lighting for any work area, you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Derf Keebslak

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use, bright, great build!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this lamp is perfect. I bought it for my uncles girlfriend, who just came home from the hospital and the lighting in her apartment where she writes is beyond horrible. Today 2/25/2019 this desktop lamp was affordable and made her smile, which has not happened in quite some time, easy to use, easy on her eyes, solid and strong supported base. The light modes are simple, and most of all I am personally looking forward to my own lamp for myself. 5 stars, thank you so much....Christopher Maynard.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Maynard

customer_reviews.title: Very good desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is very nice. The features are all exactly as described and the spread of the light is ample. BUT, this lamp will not light up your room so don't expect it to light the room. It's light is very focused to the desk, as it should be. I'm very glad I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Flexible Lighting Options
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a lamp that would support my artistic pursuits. I needed a lamp that was adjustable and portable. The LAMPAT adjustable desk lamp has been perfect for what I needed. The different light settings allow for control and flexibility depending on what I need the light for. I use the brightest, reading setting while drawing and designing on paper. It provides a bright, focused light that gives me the light I was lacking. I also appreciate the USB feature to keep my cell phone charged. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Layna M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for note writing on the iPad
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this as a study light for when I’m writing on my iPad. It works great when reading textbooks, but surprisingly well on the iPad. With the “reading” light even tho I’m studying and writing it doesn’t give off a glare on the iPad. You have to turn your iPads brightness on max though because the iPad will auto adjust to the direct light making it hard to see. But once you do all that it’s perfect. I studied for 8 hours on and off and my eyes were bothered by the light.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: Good light. No problems with it. Very bright on high; people in the next rows over notice it. I've actually been asked to dim it or make it less open so as not to distract people with its brightness. So it is effective. I like the modes on it too so it can be dimmed to a softer kind of light. I find as I get older I need more light to see comfortably but there is no doubt my vision is degrading as I get older and even so no amt. of light can stop that. The joys of middle age.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Sleek Modern Design with great options!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this desk lamp for our son who is a freshman in college. He loved that there were different lighting options for reading, studying, relaxing, & sleep. Each option ranges from a more blue to subtle yellow shade of lighting. There is a slide bar to change the brightness level within each option. We found that the lamp will automatically remember what setting you used last within each level so you can find your favorite and not have to adjust it each time you turn it on. The range of motion is slightly limited but nothing that is a problem or annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Witt

customer_reviews.title: Great light in a compact package
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these I've purchased and we love them! They are very well packaged so no issues with scratches or dents. Very little assembly (attaching base) and it is ready to plug in and use. The different lighting options are great if you use it for reading, hobbies or just mood lighting. Plus you can set it to turn off if you nod off. All this in a sleek, efficient LED light. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: peacepastor

customer_reviews.title: Decent buy
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t tried the sleep mode as of yet. It works though. I haven’t used it for hours and hours either. Classes begin in August and I needed a lamp for my study area since all courses will be online. I also have sensitivity to brightness and the warmth of lighting on screens. So at night, I need something I can adjust the way my phone automatically adjusts so that my eyes won’t feel burnt out. This lamp is definitely a wicked cool lamp. I can’t wait to use it more often. I’ll update you all once I use it more often.
customer_reviews.author: Heff

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new desk lamp for our computer desk. This is more than we could have asked for. It has four different lighting styles (study, reading, relax and sleep) with dimmers for each choice and even has a one hour timer. I've been leaving the sleep light on as a sort of back light/night light before I go to bed. Oh yeah, it's got a USB port to charge your whatever. I love this lamp and should have replaced my old singe blub, do nothing else desk lamp a long time ago!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lampat Lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice lamp. 1 HR timer with 16 different lighting adjustments. Will purchase again. UPDATE: Have had this for several months and it works great. The sleep timer was worth the price alone. It turns itself off after 60 minutes when set. The different lighting functions also are a pleasant surprise. This is a nice lamp for the price.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Best desk lamp ever!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I could not have selected a better desk lamp. It has several different settings to accommodate any and all lighting needs. It's sturdy and sleek, it doesn't take up a ton of space on your desk. It can work for any size desk. The light swivels to aluminate any area of your desk. It is the perfect addition to my work from home desk. I'm super happy that I made this purchase... I just love it! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: the perfect desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: my brother purchased one in 2018 and it still works! ofc I stole his and liked it so much I decided to get my own. I like how you can adjust the brightness and there are varying light options (some are brighter and more fluorescent while others are yellower). it’s also pretty easy to assemble. I like the sleep mode addition. there’s also a usb port next to the lamp stand so you can charge your phone and other electronics.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: What is not to like?
customer_reviews.text: The Lampat Dimmable LED Table Lamp arrived on time. Unpacking and assembly was a no-brainer and quick. All lighting levels worked as described. I purchased this for reading at my desk and it more than exceeded my expectations. The reading level is bright and white. Lamp adjusts and there is no LED overflow when positioned to your level. A definite good value. I would not hesitate to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very good lamp for everyday use.
customer_reviews.text: I like this desk lamp very much. The brightness is bright when needed and can be dimmed in steps to make it however bright you want. The color temperature setting is very nice as well you can make it softer to help with eye strain if you are not a pure white light person. The only issue I have is the light height is not very tall. You can put the light vertical but then it can get a little bright for your eyes. The Usb port on the side is not very powerful. It can power a phone but probably not enough to charge it fully while being used.
customer_reviews.author: Jw

customer_reviews.title: Great desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp as a father's day gift for my 90 year old dad who loves it. I had to show him how to use all the different features, but he quickly understood how to change all the settings and dim or brighten the lamp. He also knows how to operate the timer, but probably will never use that feature. He likes the fact that the lamp can be adjusted up or down with such ease so he can put light where he wants it. He also is intrigued with the different light settings for reading or study etc. He may even plug his old fashioned flip phone into the lamp to charge it! Great lamp.
customer_reviews.author: kyuurimaki

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Transitioning to working from home, I realized that I needed a small lamp that gave off a good amount of light as I do a lot of reading and analysis for my job. This lamp is exactly what I was looking for. It gives off the perfect amount of light in whatever setting it's on (reading, study, relax or sleep). It doesn't take up a lot of space on my desk, and it can be posed so I can move it around as I spread out papers on my desk. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: V.Allen

customer_reviews.title: The Best Desk Lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality desk lamp. I use it to do small maintenance on my electronics or anything else that requires a lot of light. It has several light setting options and it is very simple to use and choose. It has many options to bend. It is extremely useful and the price is great. I use it whenever I am working I don't think a desk lamp can get any better than this. It's a must have for every office.
customer_reviews.author: Phire404

customer_reviews.title: Good light.  Maneuverable.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift, and it works great as a task light. The color options are fun. The design is simple and it can be folded away to a compact level. There are so many of these type of lamps online, I can't tell what sets this one apart. But, I definitely prefer it to the clamp on lamps, or the spot lamps. The maneuverability allows you to target the area you are working on. The light lets you play with what you need for reading, drawing or relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: naomi pinto

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this desk lamp!
customer_reviews.text: This Lampat LED desk lamp is far and away the best product of its type I've owned. It is adjustable in dozens of ways and dimmable from a super-bright white light to gentle, easy-on-the-eyes color. Timer (60 minutes) means the lamp can be set to turn itself off should you choose. It has a stable base that keeps the lamp firmly upright while two adjustable arms ensure the light you need is always aimed just where you want it. The first lamp I purchased was destroyed in a house fire - this was one of the first things I replaced afterward because I missed it so much. Excellent product! It deserves ALL THE STARS!
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: See things on my desk that I didn't see before
customer_reviews.text: the brightness is what I needed and this gives plenty. I love how easy it is to turn it on or off, and the different levels of light is nice. I didn't think I would use the feature where you could bend it in half to get it out of the way, but I can see there will be times where I will use that feature. I might even order another one for the other side of my very long work area. It's very sturdy and appears to be very well made. I would recommend this. .
customer_reviews.author: Marcella Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: Excellent LED table lamp
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended. This is exactly what I was looking for. Pros: 1. ability to go from soft (yellowish) light all the way to bright white light (4 settings) 2. for each setting, ability to dim or brighten (5 dim/bright steps for each type of light) 3. design -- folds down out of the way, light weight, no glass components, base is sufficiently heavy to keep it stable 4. runs cool Cons: Haven't seen anything yet Haven't tested yet: Haven't tested the 60 min timer feature
customer_reviews.author: P. M.

customer_reviews.title: Desk perfect!
customer_reviews.text: What a nice desk lamp. provides perfect lighting for my work area and I love the feature of various light shades for different task. I am 6 feet tall and my desk height is 36 inches and I use a 17" lap top and the light height is perfect for me as it is high enough to be above my eye level and not too high as to not have enough light on what I am doing. This product is a full 5 stars......
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: A functional lamp at an affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: Every setting on this lamp is just about right. The reading mode is bright enough for reading and the sleep mode is dimmed enough to leave the light on all night while you're sleeping. All buttons are very sensitive and responsive to your touch. It's easy to install. The metal base is heavy enough to keep the lamp stable. Rotating the lamp is smooth and effortless. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Authorized Buyer

customer_reviews.title: good lamp. bought it for the timer function/ adult night light lol
customer_reviews.text: It's super bright and it has a lot of options to dim or soften. I got it mainly for the timer function tho so I wouldn't be leaving it on all night. and it turns off after I sleep. actually a great idea for the function of a night light. so I'm sure to have saved on electricity by the end of the month. had a little trouble screwing it in at first but I unscrewed it and re screwed it into the base and now its sturdy. 10/10 wish id had bought earlier.
customer_reviews.author: BBJ

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Lamp! 2nd time buying it!
customer_reviews.text: We initially bought this lamp for my sister who was going to stay at college; we needed something minimalistic, practical, and efficient. She uses it every single day for homework and loves it. I also got one for my office since the one I had before was taking too much space and the yellow light was not helping my eyes at all!!!!!!! I work from home all the time and I needed something reliable. This is a great lamp; it has amazing light settings, doesn't get hot, and you can retract it when not using which is great! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Milo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect desk and task light that does not take up a lot of space!
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific task and desk light. It was well packaged and easy to assemble. It has a number of different settings for brightness, including a “relax” Mode which is more of a yellowish and soothing light. I am using it at a desk and it does not take up much space. This light would also work for doing puzzles, craft projects, or anything else you need a task light for.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Inexpensive LED Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I have not had the lamp long so I cannot say with certainty how durable or energy-efficient the lamp is yet, however so far I am impressed. The lamp is LED, so it is guaranteed to use hardly any electricity, has great light output, and many different settings which allow one to change the brightness or the color of the light. The lamp's base is very sturdy, and it has a conveniently located USB charging port. It appears to be a fantastic LED lamp for the price - if it holds up long term I will be very happy!
customer_reviews.author: cleigh2

customer_reviews.title: Suuhhh-weeeet!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this light for my sons LEGO desk and I am BLOWN AWAY!!! It has FOUR different (and UNIQUE) lighting modes with FIVE BRIGHTNESS SETTINGS!! It is HUGE yet still take us a small footprint... has a USB charger and looks REALLY modern with a classic touch. Honestly... I was a little skeptical to spend the $25... but man, I'd buy another in a heartbeat. It's PERFECT
customer_reviews.author: Brian D. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, sleek desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my student work desk over two years ago. My desk was near my bed so I used it all the time. I attached my phone cable to it to charge my phone at night and frequently change the brightness settings. I like how customizable the intensity and shades that the lamp offers. The black is sleek, but gets dusty just like any other black object. I would try not to place anything on the base because it could cause some minor scratches. Otherwise it still looks like new and works well. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Bright and Simple Lamp
customer_reviews.text: The lamp comes well packaged and looks great! Buttons are responsive, color temperatures are useful and brightness is adequate for desk use and the 2A USB port on the side is very useful for a wireless phone charger - I leave my wireless charger on the base of the lamp as it's big enough to accommodate. Very satisfied and would highly recommend to anyone looking for a nice desk lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Ez

customer_reviews.title: Solution for Needed Kitchen Counter Lighting
customer_reviews.text: Problem Solver! We are renting a home with insufficient kitchen lighting. I needed a temporary light that I could take with us when we moved out. The only light in the kitchen is a flush mount ceiling fixture so when you prepared anything on the counters your boday cast a shaow over your work. This light solved the problem!!! Thank you!! It's bright and fits perfectly under upper cabinets. It's also lightweight & convenient to be able to move around the counters to different work areas. The dimmer lighting option is also nice for mood lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: this is my favorite lamp. I own 2 of them: one for each office. I have to stare at my computer all day, so being able to adjust not only the type of lighting but the brightness level really helps my tired eyes. In the other office, being able to have a bright light that I can constantly readjust the position just right for my paintings or crafts is absolutely essential. Definitely worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: DubbsB

customer_reviews.title: This little light of mine
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I purchased this light for my desk set up. I haven't had the time to fully arrange things the way I want, but there was no need to move it. The light shines so bright much it lights up the entire side of the desk when needed. I love the numerous functions and the timer is a nice touch, because sometimes I forget to turn it off. Overall an awesome purchase. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: LQHunter

customer_reviews.title: Lamp arm very cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.text: Base is solid enough, but it's just a plate. The actual lamp arm is very cheap feeling plastic. I don't see how it can have so many 5 star reviews. Certainly not worth the almost $30 they're now asking. I bought it for ~$21 with some coupon that doesn't seem to be there anymore. Going back. Update: I decided to keep it, although only because I got it for $21. It's not bad for what it is, looks nice enough, and the different light modes and touch buttons to switch between them and change the brightness are nice. Would not pay $30, but would pay $20.
customer_reviews.author: doesitmatter

customer_reviews.title: So easy to put together.. such great brightness!!
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to assemble and as soon as I plugged it in... I had light... and brighter.. and brighter!! It is fun to adjust the varied light... from a sleep light all the way up to a reading light. As my eyes are getting older, I notice that I need additional light to read many items... I happily put this beside my computer and I love how well it works for me. Plus it has a USB port for my phone!! I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karendae

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp while it worked.
customer_reviews.text: All around great lamp, no complaints. however it lasted a year....maybe. I used it for 4 months, then it went into storage because a move. Sat there for 6 months. Removed it from storage about 3 months ago. First the power supply fried on it. Replaced the power supply. Then the lamp quit working about 1 month after that.... :(
customer_reviews.author: nickalen

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp for a fair price!
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a good lamp to help me to study during the nights and there's plenty of options in the market. I normally sort my search by customer review and my lamp selection wasn't an exception. The packing was good, no damage internally, and the quality of the material is good. Regarding functionality, it has everything that you need, different intensity of light, timer, and USB port, I think I found a good winner!
customer_reviews.author: Larissa Davila

customer_reviews.title: Really good desklamp
customer_reviews.text: I purchase similar one at costco which is a little better due to it has time, current temperature, and date. Design is nicer. Even though this one doesn't have all of the above features, the light can tilt up and down, forward and back which I need while costco one can only tilt up and down. However, this one cost $5 more than costco which should not be in my option
customer_reviews.author: Krispeken

product_meta.title: Lampat LED Desk Lamp, Dimmable LED Table Lamp Black, 4 Lighting Modes, 5-Level Dimmer, Touch-Sensitive Control Panel, 1-Hour Auto Timer, 5V/2A USB Charging Port)
feature_bullets: LAMPAT Dimmable LED Desk Lamp, Black

specifications.Special Features: Modern Design, Space Saver, Touch Dimmer, No Glare Reflects on Screen
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars9,081 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
